title: A HOF Trifecta - sólo una izquierda

posts.post_title: A HOF Trifecta - sólo una izquierda
posts.post_content:
Eddie Collins Factory 25 SC 350 back SGC 30 $119

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10792/marquard-follow-through[/IMG]



All prices are net to me and include shipping.;)

Frank,

I'm your Rube on Rube.:rolleyes:
